snippet: A federal judge dismissed a lawsuit brought by the United States Chamber of Commerce and the Investment Company Institute against the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.
abstract: A federal judge dismissed a lawsuit brought by the United States Chamber of Commerce and the Investment Company Institute against the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

headline.main: In a Victory for Regulators, Judge Dismisses a Mutual Fund Lawsuit

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
